title: Update Attorney Bio on Firm Website
description: An attorney has been promoted to partner. The marketing department needs to update their bio on the firm's website.

tasks.description: Locate the attorney's profile page in the website's content management system (CMS).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the correct page to edit.

tasks.description: Update the attorney's title from 'Associate' to 'Partner'.
Add any new representative matters or awards to their bio.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the content of the bio.

tasks.description: Publish the changes to make the updated bio live.
tasks.expected_outcome: The website now reflects the attorney's promotion.
